Text: Sir Tankalot are u a retard or something ? at what point did u decide to switch this from a full DVD-R to a DVDRip ?! u do realise there are more than 50 people stuck downloading the dvd-r at around 48%? what on earth could have caused u to make this switch is beyond me!
famemon78. Sorry friend. my upplink refused to go on with that kind of big files. My computer burned upp allmost coz of all precure on it. :(

i understand ur plight brother, but i would still implore u to re upload it provided u can find a way around ur problem coz no one has uploaded this dvd-R before .. which is such a pity since its such a collector's gem.. so please if u do find a way do re up it .. thanks!
besides we were 50% of the way there already.. once even one of us have it im sure we ll be happy to take care of the seeding
famemon78: I'll fix a new copy of it and i'll put it out on tpb, only for you, friend. as an pease-offering for my fuck up last time.  ;)
